tool_description: COVID-19 API v1 built to track global corona virus outbreak.
name: COVID-19 V1
title: COVID-19 V1

api_list.name: Global historical stats
api_list.description: You can use this API to get the global historical updates.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/allhistorical"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
